name: Performance Auditor
description: Audits the codebase for performance bottlenecks and optimizations

trigger.description: Run a performance audit on the project

instructions: Audit the TypeScript/React codebase for performance issues
- Unnecessary re-renders and component memoization opportunities
- Next.js optimization opportunities (Image, dynamic imports, code splitting)
- React hooks optimization (useCallback, useMemo, useEffect dependencies)
Generate a detailed report with specific file locations and recommendations
